com.gwtplatform.mvp.rebind

Class ProxyEventMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gwtplatform.mvp.rebind.ProxyEventMethod

  • public class ProxyEventMethod
extends Object
    Represents a method, in the presenter, that is responsible of handling an event.
    Author:
    Philippe Beaudoin

    • Constructor Summary

      • ensureNoClashWith

        public void ensureNoClashWith(ProxyEventMethod previousMethod)
                       throws UnableToCompleteException
        Ensures that this method does not clash with the one passed as parameters. Logs an error and throws UnableToCompleteException if a clash occurs.
        Parameters:
        previousMethod - The method to check against.
        Throws:
        UnableToCompleteException - If a clash is observed.

      • addImplementedInterface

        public void addImplementedInterface(com.google.gwt.user.rebind.ClassSourceFileComposerFactory composerFactory)
        Ensures the class being built by the ClassSourceFileComposerFactory implements the interface required to handle this event.
        Parameters:
        composerFactory - The composer factory.

      • writeAddHandler

        public void writeAddHandler(com.google.gwt.user.rebind.SourceWriter writer)
        Writes the call required to ensure the proxy handles this event.
        Parameters:
        writer - The SourceWriter.

      • writeHandlerMethod

        public void writeHandlerMethod(com.google.gwt.user.rebind.SourceWriter writer)
        Writes the definition of the method responsible of handling this event.
        Parameters:
        writer - The SourceWriter.
